resources.string: At Varejão Opini, you will always find fresh and carefully selected fruits, vegetables, greens, and natural products. We work with local producers to ensure quality, fair prices, and the same welcoming service every time.

At Kekantu, every dish is prepared with fresh ingredients and a special touch of care. We serve flavorful, well-seasoned comfort food, just the way you like it! Whether for lunch, dinner, or a quick snack, here you will find quality, good service, and a cozy atmosphere.

At Malibu Modas, you\'ll find the latest fashion trends with quality, comfort, and prices that fit your budget. We work with women\'s and men\'s clothing for all styles and occasions — from casual to elegant.

At Atemporal Barbershop, uniting the classic and the modern is our differential. We offer cuts, shaves, and men\'s grooming with quality, attention, and that welcoming atmosphere that makes you feel at home.
At São José Bakery, every bread is made with care and that irresistible fresh smell. We offer bread, cakes, sweets, and savory snacks prepared with quality ingredients and constant care.

At Gui Snacks, every sandwich is prepared with fresh ingredients and great care. We have irresistible options for hamburgers, side dishes, juices, and that ice-cold soda that completes the perfect combo.
